public class WorldArgument<C> extends cloud.commandframework.arguments.CommandArgument<@NotNull C,@NotNull World>
A World argument that belongs to a command.

    • resolve

      @NotNull public static @NotNull World resolve(@NotNull @NotNull cloud.commandframework.context.CommandContext<@NotNull Sender> context, @NotNull @NotNull String name)
      Resolve World from command context.

      If context does not contain a World and the sender is a Player then the player's world will be used.

      Parameters:
      context - command context
      name - argument name
      Returns:
      world
      Throws:
      WorldParseException - if context did not contain a World and the sender is not a Player, or the world is not enabled
